name: Game & Watch Gallery
overview: Original and updated versions of four Game & Watch hand held games! Classic versions will take you back to the '80s and a simpler time in video games. Modern versions feature your favorite characters and will bring you to the present with improved play control and sound effects. -Enjoy four different games! Manhole - Don't let pedestrians fall. Fire - Rescue the jumpers. Octopus - Retrive the sunken treasure. Oil Panic - Catch the dripping oil. -New Interrupt Save feature lets you stop and restart anytime! -Battery-backed memory saves all your scores!
